Web Security

How would you advise a potential client to secure his/her website from web security attacks? Note: the word count for your answer should not be greater than 250 words

I would advise my client to secure his/her website by implementing some practices that will protect and secure the website like sanitization of data by a well-known third-party solution like for example OR Mog NodeJS, securing authorization and authentication by using a two-factor authentication like OneLogin. In addition, I would integrate and deliver an automatic process to run code for changes that does not pass checks, for this I can use GitHub Action. Finally, I would make sure for the back-end team to implement an automatic user timeout so the user who left their credentials and some other sensitive information hanging can be automatically log out or redirected to a safe page in the browser.
